alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 9:32PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will improve Thursday morning as winds diminish.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
